summary: Coding is my passion and I learned how to develop software on my own. I always write code that is testable and maintainable, design software that is robust and adaptable, and enhance performance with the latest technologies.
about: Presently, I am engaged as a freelance developer at MOSTAQL, operating from Abu Dhabi, UAE. With over two years of professional expertise as software developer, I translate concepts into tangible results using Python, JavaScript in conjunction with contemporary tools like React.js, Node.js, Flask, and MySQL. My personal fulfillment stems from the constant pursuit of self-improvement, aspiring to surpass yesterday's version of myself. Keep scrolling to explore a selection of the projects I have actively contributed to.
